headline.main: 3 YACHTS DONATED TO AID U.S., BRITAIN; G.B. Lambert Gives Famous Schooner Atlantic and Motor Tender to Coast Guard YANKEE WILL BE JUNKED $10,000 Proceeds Will Be Gift to England to Help Buy a Spitfire Fighter Plane

lead_paragraph: Gerard B. Lambert, rear commodore of the New York Yacht Club, yesterday gave a small-sized navy to the cause of national defense and the aid of Britain.
abstract: Gives yachts Atlantic and Utility to U S Coast Guard Acad; illus; junks yacht Yankee, to give fund from hull sale to Brit
snippet: Gerard B. Lambert, rear commodore of the New York Yacht Club, yesterday gave a small-sized navy to the cause of national defense and the aid of Britain....
